column4: Hi. aptitude dist-upgrade is trying to remove the linux-image package (i guess it's a bad move :\). I've the proposed repository activated. Did anyone had the same issue or knows how to resolve it? (Full aptitude output: http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/m7da906f6 )
i think it's dummy pack as ubuntu-desktop
yes, it is a metapackage that always depends on the latest kernel, but that is exactly why I'd prefer to keep it installed.
